name: places/ChIJ38e2y-xYwokR0q1BWzrIKhI
adrFormatAddress: 909 5th Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: David Orentreich is the best dermatologist I have ever been too! He continuously makes my face look amazing, while making me feel it. Ever thing he has done to me last the full time he says it's going to. I never have any bruising, soreness or problem after. David takes his time in making sure you are comfortable and aware of what's going on every step of the way. David takes his time to examine each step he does to make sure he is creating perfection. After I'm we have finished my services,  David recommend the best product that his brand and office offers. They keep my face clear and glowing.overall my experience from when I walked through the door from the reception desk welcoming you and assuring comfort as you come in, to walking out and feeling like I'm the best looking.  David Orentreich is the dermatologist to see in NYC.

originalText.text:
I hope Dr Norman is still alive and well!  My youngest daughter turned 21 last week.  In the spring of the year she was in kindergarten, she lost all her hair.  She was upset, confused, and embarrassed.  We immediately brought her to several doctors who did all kinds of things and gave her all kinds of drugs.  Nothing worked.  In June of that year, we heard about Dr Norman Orentreich.  I called the office, and since she was a child he said to bring her in right away.  The next day, we crossed the Hudson and were sitting in Dr Norman's waiting room.
When we went into his office he couldn't have been anymore wonderful and gentle with my baby's emotions and bad state of mind.
He treated my daughter with "tinctures".  By the time she started school that following September, she had a full head of hair!
I have no idea how to thank this wonderful, innovative, super-intelligent miracle worker!
She still has the little, colorful pin cushion he gave my daughter...and we talk about him often.
Thank you Dr Norman...where ever you are!  We may not have seen you in sixteen years, but you will always be considered part of our expanded family.

With Love and Respect,
~Donna Polles

text.text:

In June of that year, we heard about Dr Norman Orentreich.  I called the office, and since she was a child he said to bring her in right away.
